## `SelectWindow` {#batch-selectwindow}

Selects a window in the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SelectWindow(SideBarSection section,
             number windowId)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`SideBarSection`](#sidebarsection) section | The section of the project that the window is in. |
| `number` windowId | The ID of the window to select. |
:::
